required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 09, 2023
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Understand the Long-term Safety and Effects of an Experimental Gene Therapy for Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy.
clinical_study.official_title: Long-term Follow-up Safety and Efficacy Study in Participants With Duchenne Muscular Dystrophy Who Have Received Fordadistrogene Movaparvovec in a Preceding Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to understand the safety and effects of an experimental gene therapy called fordadistrogene movaparvovec. We are seeking participants from previous Pfizer interventional studies. We will follow participants' experience in this study for 10 years after the end of their previous study. Participants will have 1 annual onsite visit and a few annual remote visits. The exact number of remote visits will be decided by their study doctor.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: At least annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of participants with serious adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: At least annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with adverse events considered related to treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: At least annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of particpants with adverse events considered related to treatment
primary_outcome.time_frame: At least annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with malignancy adverse event
primary_outcome.time_frame: At least annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically significant findings in electrocardiogram (ECG) assessments
primary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically significant findings in cardiac troponin I laboratory examinations
primary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

primary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with clinically significant findings in echocardiogram parameters
primary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in the ability to walk 10 meters unassisted
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in the ability to climb stairs.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in the Performance of Upper Limb (PUL) 2.0 entry score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in the North Star Ambulatory Assessment total score
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study
secondary_outcome.description: Applicable to a sub-set of participants only

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in percent of predicted forced vital capacity (%pFVC) and percent predicted peak expiratory flow (%pPEF)
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in left ventricular ejection fraction (LVEF) on echocardiogram
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in the Modified Pediatric Outcomes Data Collection Instrument
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from pre-dose in the Upper Limb Function Patient Reported Outcome Measure
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

secondary_outcome.measure: Age when percent predicted forced vital capacity <30%
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study
From 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

From 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study
At least annually from 5 through 10 years after dosing in the interventional study

arm_group.description: All participants enrolled in the study.

intervention.description: gene therapy administered in a previous study.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Participants who received fordadistrogene movaparvovec in a previous Pfizer interventional study.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Investigator site staff directly involved in the study and their family members

link.description: To obtain contact information for a study center near you, click here.

patient_data.ipd_description: Pfizer will provide access to individual de-identified participant data and related study documents (e.g. protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan (SAP), Clinical Study Report (CSR)) upon request from qualified researchers, and subject to certain criteria, conditions, and exceptions. Further details on Pfizer's data sharing criteria and process for requesting access can be found at: https://www.pfizer.com/science/clinical_trials/trial_data_and_results/data_requests.
